quotes.quote: Sugar candy tasted better than bitter truth.
Syntactic sugar causes cancer of the semicolon.
Because sugar is not arsenic, many graves are full.
Sugar is responsible for a lot of deaths. Arguably more than crack cocaine.
Sugar is the next tobacco, without a doubt, and that industry should be scared. It should be taxed just like tobacco and anything else that can, frankly, destroy lives.
Seeing your glucose every minute on your phone, it really changes your lifestyle. You ask yourself, 'Do I really need that piece of cake? No, because I don't want to stress out my pancreas.'
Sugar and sand may be mixed together, but the ant rejects the sand and goes off with the sugar grain; so pious men lift the good from the bad.
You can't dump one cup of sugar into the ocean and expect to get syrup. If everybody sweetened her own cup of water, then things would begin to change.
Caramels are only a fad. Chocolate is a permanent thing.
Sugar and chocolate, anything that boosts your serotonin levels, is something people, I think, crave.
You need a good, healthy diet - it's about finding out what your body needs. Sugar is a disaster for skin, as is white flour.
Just a spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down.
We don't need sugar to live, and we don't need it as a society.
Sugar is not so sweet to the palate as sound to the healthy ear.
Sugar is more present in America or England than it is in France. I think there is an addiction to sweetness.
If you're eating sugar throughout the day, you're spiking your blood sugar level and you're becoming a fat storing machine.
Sugar is celebratory. Sugar is something that we used to enjoy. Now, it basically has coated our tongues. It's turned into a diet staple, and it's killing us.

The optimum amount of sugar in a product became known as the 'bliss point.' Food inventors and scientists spend a huge amount of time formulating the perfect amount of sugar that will send us over the moon and send products flying off the shelves.
